long_description: . Author: Scott Cook. Softcover; 144 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Maverick Publications; copyright 2010. Updated edition includes hikes, museums, resorts and tourist attractions, although it leaves out commercial endeavors unless they are one-of-a-kind. Showcases the variety and diversity of attractions and landscapes surrounding Bend. Highlights the best hikes and attractions in a succinct and discriminating manner. Use in conjunction with a sense of humor and playfulness!
short_description: Bend Overall is a fun, greatest hits collection of Mother Nature's finest hikes and interesting attraction, generally within an hour's drive of Bend, Oregon.
